name: Buzz Bomber
description:
Buzz Bomber is a 2D aerial dogfighter that is fast paced and full of chaos! Wade through the bullet hell mania as the mighty bee, chosen to protect their home. Your only objective: kill as many enemies as possible in the insect war.

Choose between Lite, Standard and Heavy body types, as well as interchangeable primary and secondary weapons to find a perfect combo, defeat the enemies and gain the highest score!

Buzz Bomber offers a variety of custom game play options, where no playthrough is the same! There are unique enemies and horrifyingly cute bosses who wreak havoc throughout the game - which, thanks to our Day-Night Cycle, simulates real ecosystems! The gameplay pays homage to Luftrausers, and our art-style is intended to give players that typical 8-bit arcade feel: now with more bit! 

Bee-Have now!  

//Arachnophobia Warning//

This game contains a Spider boss. Please see the Tutorial to help you determine if this game is suitable for you to play.
